Clickable HTML Donation Buttons

Click this demo button to reveal a donation address and scanable QR code.

Use the form below to create a button like this for your website. Accept donations directly to your wallet with no middleman. Direct peer-to-peer transactions are the essence of sound money, and embodies Pirate Chain's mission.
